mapper.select: SELECT * from ( select sys_order.id,oprice ,sys_car.name as carName ,sys_city.name as getName ,city.`name` as backName ,sys_order.`status`from sys_order, sys_car,sys_city ,sys_city as city where uid = #{uid} and sys_order.cid = sys_car.id and sys_order.getid = sys_city.id and sys_order.backid = city.id) as site order by id desc
